question.title: MouseAdapter#mouseReleased() does not get called when drag event is called in quick succession
question.body:
If I quickly drag this panel outside its parent it doesn't call the mouseReleased method. I tried adding a print statement at the end of the mouseDragged and mouseReleased method and I noticed that it will not be called if I release and mouseDragged is still not finished printing all of the pending mouse drag events.

public class OrderingOptionPanel extends JPanel {
    private Point clickLocation;
    private Point originalLocation;

    public OrderingOptionPanel(String text) {
        // ...

        addMouseListener(new MouseAdapter() {
            @Override
            public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e) {
                // ...
            }

            @Override
            public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e) {
                setLocation(originalLocation);
            }
        });

        addMouseMotionListener(new MouseMotionAdapter() {
            @Override
            public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e) {
                // ...
            }
        });

        add(new JLabel(text));
    }
}
